captions.text: -Hi, everybody.
My name is Shaun.

I'm the cameraman behind
Cute Girls Hairstyles.

And this week Mimi's been
out of town all week.

I've been home alone
with all six kids.

Well, today's the
day we upload videos.

And we looked and we saw we had
a video that the sound wasn't

very good, so we
couldn't use it.

So I called Mindy
on Friday and said,
what are we supposed to do?
Guess what she said.
-You do it, Daddy.
-I've got to do a Daddy 'do.

So I'm going to
do the best I can.

I'm not a good replacement
for Mindy at all.

But what we're going
to show you today

are pullbacks into
a square knot.
OK?
Let's start with that.

So the first thing
that I'm going to do

is I actually take a
section, just a small section

above the ear about
an inch or so,

leaving-- you don't
want to go too high,

because you want to be able
to pull the bangs back.

And you just leave a section
here and a section here,
on the front.

But the first thing
I'm going to do,

because she does
have fine hair, is

to help control the flyaways
I'm going to spray it,

just a little bit
of water in there.

And as well in the back, just--
again, for those flyaways

I just want to keep them
under control there.

Sorry, sweetie, if I get
you a little bit wet.

Next thing I'm going to
do is grab my rubber band,

and just pull the
rest of this hair

that we're not going to be
doing anything with, just out

of the way into a soft
ponytail, just like that.
Turn her back this way.

So now what I'm going
to do is-- actually,

even to control the
flyaways even more,

I'm going to put a little
bit of this stuff in it.

Mindy says this is
good to use, if you

need to control some
flyaways and give

some texture to the hair, some
grit, called Jonathan Dirt.
Let's give it a try.
Smell that.
What does it smell like?
Smells good.

Smells like frosting,
little buttercream frosting.
Do you dare me to try it?
-Yeah.
-Really?
-Mm-hmm.
-You want to try it?
No, don't do it.
Don't do it.
Don't do it.
It's not bad, but--

OK, I'm going to put a little
bit of that in her hair,

just to add some texture,
some grit for this--

not that we're
going to be doing--
do the same thing on this side.
Looks pretty good.
Come on this side, now.

Now I'm going to grab
my rat tail comb,

and take that section of
hair and just comb it back.

That's why we call
it a pullback.

We're not twisting the
hair, we're literally just
going to pull it back.

Can you hold that
for me, sweetie?
There you go.

We'll do the same
thing on this side.
OK.

If you can tie your shoe,
you can do this part.

We're just going to
cross over, and pull

this tail up through--
pretty simple--
and pull it fairly tight.

Can I have you hold it
right there, sweetie?
A little higher.

Now I'm going to go
through and do it again.
Pretty easy.

All right, now that
I've got that done,

I'm going to pull out
the rest of the hair

and grab a simple
small, blonde bobby pin.

And Mindy says these
are good to use,

because they-- oops-- camouflage
themselves in her hair better.

Just going to grab that
whole little tail there,

and I'm going to push that
bobby pin all the way in, just
like that.

I'm going to do the same
thing on the other side--

grab that whole tail,
and push in all the way
in, just like that.
OK, ready?

We're going to let it
go, one, two, three.
There you go.

There's your pullbacks
into a square knot.

You can fidget with it, and
make it look the way you want.

Now because of the flyaways
that she does have,

I'm going to go through
with some hairspray and just

gently kind of smooth out those
flyaways that she may have.

And then because
it is a knot, I'm

going to grab and just spritz
a little bit of hairspray

in there and give a
little bit of form,
and let that dry that way.

And then we'll do a little bit
of hairspray here on the front,

as well, just to
keep those back.
And there you have it.
Pretty cute, easy, simple.

Not something you probably
want to do for a PE day,

but it's so easy
a dad can do it.

I've been taking care
of these kids all week.

We've been eating cake,
cookies, ice cream, slushies.

Mindy's going to be
really upset at me.

But anyway, what to you say
we go get some ice cream now?
-Yeah.
-Sounds good?
OK.

Don't forget, Mindy did set
up an Instagram account.

It' s called Cute
Girls Hairstyles,
the same as the channel name.

And we can't wait for Mindy
to come back next week,
and I'm sure you can't, either.

And thanks a lot
for your patience.

I'm no substitute for Mindy,
but I hope you enjoy it.
Thank you.
Bye.
-Bye.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

title: Pullbacks into Square Knot | Daddy 'Do Hairstyles | Cute Girls Hairstyles
